snippet.title: Twisted Tower - Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Twisted Tower Demo is out now! Get a quick taste of this twisted nightmare, experience part of the mysterious story while battling through the enemies on the first floors of the tower.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2506090/Twisted_Tower_Demo/?snr=1_7_7_230_150_1

Experience a mysterious and emotional story as you travel through an abandoned 1950s resort with varying unique paths, ensuring your playthrough is fresh and engaging. Face corrupted fairy-tale mascots with a wacky arsenal of weapons like a rubber-band pistol, whack-a-mole mallet, a farting shotgun, and more! Can you make it to the top and paint the halls red with bloodfetti to save your lost love, or will you succumb to the nightmares from your childhood?

https://3drealms.com/
